member.name: CERT_SYSTEM_STORE_RELOCATE_PARA
member.summary: The CERT_SYSTEM_STORE_RELOCATE_PARA structure contains data to be passed to when that function's dwFlags parameter is set to CERT_SYSTEM_STORE_RELOCATE_FLAG. It allows the application to specify not only the name of the store to be opened, but also registry hKey information indicating a registry location other than the default location.

member.name: CERT_SYSTEM_STORE_RELOCATE_PARA.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pvBase
member.summary: A pointer to a void to allow the system store location's base to be passed in a number of different forms.

member.name: CERT_SYSTEM_STORE_RELOCATE_PARA.DUMMYUNIONNAME2.pvSystemStore
member.summary: A pointer to a void to allow the name of the system store to be passed in various forms.

member.name: CERT_SYSTEM_STORE_RELOCATE_PARA.DUMMYUNIONNAME2.pszSystemStore
member.summary: A null-terminated ASCII string that names the system store.

member.name: CERT_SYSTEM_STORE_RELOCATE_PARA.DUMMYUNIONNAME2.pwszSystemStore
member.summary: A null-terminated Unicode string that names the system store.
